nodes.text: The Assorhians were the native sentient species of Assorhan.
The Assorhians were a sentient species divided into two races: the black-skinned Osoppohans and the white-skinned Asoppohans.

The Assorhians ruled the Assorhian Kingdom. The race of each Assorhian determined their position in society: the black-skinned Osoppohans were the ruling caste, while the white-skinned Asoppohans were the slave caste.
